title: Community Action Guide
prompt: A weathered wooden table in a small-town community center or church basement, scattered with hand-drawn maps, printed resources, and coffee cups, captured in warm afternoon light from tall windows casting long shadows across the surface. The composition emphasizes worn hands of community members pointing at documents and sketching notes together, shot from above and slightly to the side to show the collaborative work without revealing faces. The mood is earnest and practicalâ€”textures of paper, wood grain, and faded coffee stains suggest modest resources and determined action. Shot in documentary style with natural, unmanipulated light and shallow depth of field keeping focus on the tangible work of planning.
